document_data.name: Szwentil Illeon
document_data.mainbody: '''Szwentil Illeon''' was the wealthiest man in [[Marsember]], [[Cormyr]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: He was one of the six founders of the [[Six Coffers Market Priakos]], owner of [[The Roaring Griffon]],
document_data.Description: Szwentil was slim and youthful in appearance, and always dressed neatly in black.
document_data.Personality: Szwentil was set on constructing as many ships and buildings as possible in [[Sembia]], and buying as much land as possible in Cormyr and Sembia, in order to increase his power.
